title: GEOLOGIC MAP OF THE DIRTY DEVIL, FRENCH SPRING - HAPPY CANYON, AND HORSESHOE CANYON WILDERNESS STUDY AREAS, WAYNE AND GARFIELD COUNTIES, UTAH
base_map: U.S. Geological Survey, 1:62,500 Bull Mountain, 1952; Fiddler Butte, 1953; Hanksville, 1963; Orange Cliffs, 1953; Robbers Roost Canyon, 1963; The Spur, 1953
